mapper.sql: id, supplier, contacts, phonenum, email, description, isystem, type, enabled, AdvanceIn, BeginNeedGet, BeginNeedPay, AllNeedGet, AllNeedPay, fax, telephone, address, taxNum, bankName, accountNumber, taxRate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO supplier (id ,supplier, TYPE, contacts, phonenum, fax, telephone, email, address, AdvanceIn, taxNum , bankName , accountNumber, taxRate, BeginNeedGet, BeginNeedPay, AllNeedGet, AllNeedPay, description, isystem, enabled) VALUES(#{id},#{supplier},#{type}, #{contacts},#{phonenum},#{fax},#{telephone},#{email},#{address},#{advancein},#{taxnum}, #{bankname},#{accountnumber},#{taxrate},#{beginneedget},#{beginneedpay},#{allneedget}, #{allneedpay},#{description},#{isystem},#{enabled})
mapper.update: UPDATE supplier SET supplier=#{supplier}, TYPE=#{type}, contacts=#{contacts}, phonenum=#{phonenum}, fax=#{fax}, telephone=#{telephone}, email=#{email}, address=#{address}, AdvanceIn=#{advancein}, taxNum =#{taxnum}, bankName =#{bankname}, accountNumber=#{accountnumber}, taxRate=#{taxrate}, BeginNeedGet=#{beginneedget}, BeginNeedPay=#{beginneedpay}, AllNeedGet=#{allneedget}, AllNeedPay=#{allneedpay}, description=#{description}, isystem=#{isystem}, enabled=#{enabled} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select:
select from supplier where 1=1
and supplier like concat(concat('%',#{supplier}),'%')
and telephone like concat(concat('%',#{telephone}),'%')
and phonenum like concat(concat('%',#{phonenum}),'%')
and description like concat(concat('%',#{description}),'%')
